participant_1.background:
I take my dog on hiking trips up volcanoes, and he loves the challenge!
i look down on people who did not.
I'm a klutz, but I'm still proud of my comic book collection.
i have never done drugs because i do not know where to buy them.
i have two dogs , one pitbull and old english bulldog.

participant_2.background:
I am not too concerned with my appearance, but I do like to look my best for my girlfriend.
i love to go shopping.
I once dressed up as a superhero and told the police officer that I was on my way to save the world.
I'm not rich, but I enjoy playing fetch with my dogs and drinking Pepsi.
I sometimes miss my friends because I have a pet iguana that takes up a lot of my time.

content.text: Hi, did you have a good day?
It was okay, how was yours?
It was good, I took my dogs up a volcano today.
Wow, that sounds like a lot of fun! What kind of dogs do you have?
I have a pitbull and an old english bulldog.
Those are both cool breeds, I have a pet iguana.
Really? How long have you had your iguana?
For about 7 years now, it's a lot of work but it's a great pet.
I've never had an iguana before, but they seem like cool animals.
They are, they're really smart and they can live for a long time.
That's good to know, maybe I'll get one someday.
